description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Rotate the falling blocks to earn a High Score! Enjoy 4 game modes, 4 unique power-ups, brand new shapes, and 4 original songs. Battle a friend head to head or compete with 3 others to see who is the best. Attack your opponent by shooting, or stealing their blocks, rotating their world, or obstructing their view. Bearcat Coders - Matt Harbaugh, Greg Hill, Kurt Prenger. WWW.SUPERXBLOX360.COM
